title: Two co-founders of Elon Musk's xAI resign, joining exodus
description: xAI co-founders Tony Wu and Jimmy Ba have resigned from the artificial intelligence firm they started with billionaire Elon Musk less than three years ago, they said in social media posts.
content:
Feb 10 (Reuters) - xAI co-founders Tony Wu and Jimmy Ba have resigned from the artificial intelligence firm they started with billionaire Elon Musk less than three years ago, they said in social media posts.

title: S&P 500, Nasdaq dip with economic data, earnings in focus
description: Drawing a mixed bag of reactions from Indian investors, the US market outcome presented a dichotomy. The Dow Jones celebrated a new peak, yet the S&P 500 and Nasdaq ended on a down note. Attention turns towards forthcoming labor statistics, as heavy tech spending on artificial intelligence weighs on market psychology.

title: Why AGI is 100x bigger than the Manhattan Project-and 75% likely to fail

content:

content:
